attributes.action: change the law to make it illegal to sell off BAA assets to anything other than a BRITISH registered individual or company.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time this country, like all our EU partners, applied the principle that some of our companies are national assets.  If BAA is to be split up then it must remain in british hands.  Make it illegal for any part of BAA to be sold to any(thing)(one) other than a british company or national.  BAA MUST REMAIN IN BRITISH HANDS AT ALL TIMES.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
